title: 1 Bed in Bella Vista
description:
Description
First floor one bed/one bath in safe, family friendly Bella Vista neighborhood. Blocks from the Italian Market and many great restaurants and coffee shops, the Magic Gardens, parks, and South Street (Acme, Whole Foods, CVS, and Rite Aid are all about a 5 minute walk). Easy walk to Center City, on the 47 bus route, and permit street parking is available.
Apartment has a gas fireplace, dishwasher, private patio, central AC, and hardwood floors. Basement has free laundry and generous storage closet. The landlord is very friendly and responsive; he lives with his family upstairs and are the only others to occupy the building.
Available for sublet March 1-August 1 with the option to extend an additional year lease. Rent is $1500 plus gas and electric. First, last, and one month’s security deposit due at signing.
No pets and no smoking.

Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Colonial Home Ready for YOU!
description:
Newly Available in the Sought After Sugar Valley Development is this 3-Bedroom, 2 Bath Colonial all ready to put your Design Style to it so that you can make it truly YOURS! Entering this great home via Double-Doors, you enter a convenient Foyer that leads to the Four Upstairs Bedrooms, Formal Living Room, Open Kitchen, Formal Dining Room, and a Large Great Room with a Vaulted Ceiling as well as a Colonial Brick Fireplace. This is a wonderful room for both relaxing by an open fire, entertaining, and accessing the wide open Back Yard included in this nearly half-acre lot. The Bedrooms are Large with a Master Bedroom complete with a Full Bathroom. There is also a second Full Bathroom with Double-Sink to accommodate your Family and Guests. Popular Community not only boasts highly ranked North Penn Schools, but is also popular for walking as you will see anytime you drive through it. Friendly Neighbors abound who are willing to help in any way to make you feel at Home. No Neighbors behind you though so desired privacy is a trademark here. For people of Faith, there are Churches of all Faiths represented very close to home. For entertainment, Merrymead Farm is just around the corner as is Freddy's Family Fun Center. Fine Food your style, the Historic and renowned William Penn Inn is only minutes away. Now, let's talk about Convenience. This home is Very Close to Shopping, Public Transportation including SEPTA Regional Rail. It is also minutes away from the Northeast Extension of the PA Turnpike (Lansdale interchange) to connect to the Lehigh Valley, the Poconos, and of course the City of Brotherly Love, Philadelphia. Valley Forge National Park is also very close via Valley Forge Rd. (Rt. 363). So, if you desire a peaceful, convenient, friendly, and safe environment for your first or next home, do NOT miss out on this opportunity. It is priced to sell so it will not last long. You are invited to make an appointment today or call with ANY questions. Some furnishings shown are available For Rent.
Are You interested to rent it please reply with your number. Thank you!

title: Rare Fitler Square North and South facing bi-level penthouse condomi
description: Rare Fitler Square North and South facing bi-level penthouse condominium with 2 balconies and garage parking. This 1,700+ sqft 2 bed, 2 bath plus media/den sanctuary has been renovated from top to bottom with exquisite attention to detail. The open living area boasts amazing natural light, cathedral ceilings, hardwood floors, and fireplace. Perfectly located off the living area is a 23 ft deck with amazing city views perfect for entertaining, outdoor dining, or just a breath of fresh air. The kitchen features white cabinetry, subway tiled backsplash, stainless appliances, stone counters and breakfast bar. On this level is a Media/Den that may be used as a home office and gym. There is a large bedroom, full hall bath, large and ample closet space. A second 23 ft balcony is adjacent to the guest bedroom and media room. The second level is home to the primary bedroom suite with lofted ceilings, walk-in closet, and a full stone bath with skylight, double vanity, and soaking tub. The nighttime view is enchanting. Located in the boutique pet-friendly Palladian building, you will enjoy a secure entrance, elevator access, private onsite garage parking, bike storage and an additional storage locker. Immediate proximity to all that Center City and Fitler Square has to offer including world-class shopping and dining, local parks and Schuylkill Trail, Trader Joe’s and quick access to all transportation options.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets.
